summary: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|Walter Huston|Tim Holt|Bruce Bennett|Barton MacLane|Alfonso Bedoya|Arturo Soto Rangel|Manuel Dondé|José Torvay|Margarito Luna|Robert Blake|Guillermo Calles|Roberto Cañedo|Spencer Chan|Jacqueline Dalya|Ralph Dunn|Ernesto Escoto|Pat Flaherty|Martin Garralaga|Jack Holt|John Huston|Francisco Islas|Mario Mancilla|Julian Rivero|Ángela Rodríguez|Jay Silverheels|Ray Spiker|Valdespino|Ildefonso Vega|Harry J. Vejar|Ignacio Villalbazo|Clifton Young
title: El tesoro de Sierra Madre
